QuestData.Title: Goldfield's War
QuestData.Description: I'm not leaving. I'm never leaving.$b$bThose quilboar, they killed them. I gave her the watch, told her to hurry. Grab our boy and get to the house while I got the gun...$b$b<Goldfield is choking back tears.>$b$bI won't leave. Our family has our roots here. They would want me to stay, don't you understand? This is our farm. My boy, he wanted to join the militia. I made him a sword...$b$b<Goldfield takes a deep breath.>$b$bNow you know. Help me retake my farm. Grab a gun and let's kill every last one.
QuestData.RewardText: It's done. My family is avenged.
